name: A Kind Red Motel
description:
A game made for the Vampire: The Masquerade Jam.

This is our teams first official game ever! And first time ever using Godot, so double yay!

Team:  

  • Liesey -Writing/Vampire Wrangling
  • Nikkidee -Game Design
  • Mab (lanternowl) - Coding/Art
  • Malaloba- Coding 

Zip contains the exe and pck 

Controls:

  1. Left click to drag
  2. Right Click to open and close docs
  3. Esc or P to toggle pause menu
